threats.title: Developer commits secret to Git
threats.description: A developer commits secrets to version control either accidentally or on purpose. An angry employee with read access to the repository finds the secrets and proceeds to use them to steal end-user data
threats.mitigation:
Adhere to the principal of Need to Know and ensure that production secrets are not shared with individuals who don't have a need to know.

Adhere to the principal of Least Privilege and ensure secrets only have the permissions to access what they require

threats.title: Attacker uploads malicious code to internal Git repository
threats.description: An attacker gains access to the Git repository and injects malicious code which is integrated into the product and shipped downstream.
threats.mitigation:
Ensure Git software is patched
Background check each employee
Follow the principal of Least Privilege and only employees with a need to access the Git repository have access.
Ensure Git is only available on VPN

threats.title: Leaked Pipeline Credentials
threats.description: An attacker could compromise credentials used in the pipeline and use them for malicious purposes
threats.mitigation:
Expire and rotate credentials and secrets regularly.
Encrypt credentials wherever they must be stored
Follow principal of Least Privilege to minimise risk if credentials are leaked

threats.title: Pipeline artifacts may contain sensitive information
threats.description: Careless logging and artifact generation may result in sensitive data contained in artifacts
threats.mitigation:
Do not log secrets
Require authentication to access data stores

threats.title: Supply Chain Attack Against Upstream Dependencies
threats.description: A dependency is compromised by a malicious actor who inserts malicious code to hijack end-user devices
threats.mitigation:
Assess dependencies with SAST/DAST tools to find vulnerabilities
Minimise use of external dependencies
Regularly update dependencies to patch undiscovered vulnerabilities, however, do not update until dependencies have been assessed for new vulnerabilities

threats.title: Registry Injection
threats.description: A malicious actor could inject malicious images into the container repository.
threats.mitigation:
Require authentication to upload images
Use RBAC to ensure only the pipeline and approved users can push images to the repository
